rpm

"redhat package manager"

Posted by awd on January 29, 2015

finger @kernl.org 获得最新的代码列表

Redhat Package Manager
rpm -e –nodeps 强制卸载
rpm -i src.rpm 安装软件源代码包
rpmbuild -bb H.src 做rpm
rpm -ivh 安装rpm
rpm -Uivh 升级

apt-get update
apt-get install
apt-get remove
